name: Bomball
description:
Imagine a Top-Down Football, with a bomb! Where you have to shoot the bomb at your enemy's base!

  • Each base (or goal) has a health bar. Shoot the ball at your opponent's base to damage it and win!
  • Avoid conceding  goals! protect your base!
  • Aim and shoot the bomb, or dash towards it, whatever it takes to defend your base and attack your target!

USE A CONTROLLER FOR BEST EXPERIENCE

Bomball created by Iman Irajdoost and Abbas Zolfaghari
